    Direction
    Direction.perspective​(PlayerColor playerColor)
    gets the correct perspective for the provided player color.this is necessary because for example: a white pawn push(Direction.U) is the exact opposite of a black pawn push (Direction.D). so the perspective needs to be in relation to the moving color.
